obe aathmiya sagaya me kathawa liyanne wilwaththa istesame deweni wedikawe indan.paththakin penne la midumakin wasunu kandak.dannam welawa hanndawe pahayi hathalis pahayi.ikmanata gedara enna hithagena kotuwen kochchiyata nagga sagayata waradi kochchiyakata nagime papayata wilwaththa istesamata tikak ehayin hadissiyenma bahinna siduwuna.karume thamayi.hemin sare willawaththa istesamata awidagena aawa.aayeth gampahata yana kochchiya thiyenne hayatalu.watetama miduma nisa sagaya kamathiyi 'rabar kamhale le pallama'kiyana kathawa idiripath karanna.kagalla,lankawe rabar walata itha prasiddha disthrikkayak.kagalle guptha rabar wathu yayaka paththakin goda nagunu rabar kamhalaka thawamath siduwana adbhutha janaka siduwimak ganayi me..........aananda ee game siti kadisara tharunayek.hamogema sith dinagena suhadawa katayuthu kirime hakiyawa aanandata thibuna.wadikal iskolayakata gihin igena ganime waramak nolabunath sahaja buddhiyak ohuta pawathuna.aananda rakiyawa widiyata kale rabar kiri kapimath,kapu kiri kamhalata genagos wikinimath.aananda wagema thawath tharuna tharuniyo kihipadenek ma me rakiyawa kala.thamanta pramanawath mudalak kamhal himiyagen nolabunath,ee aya aananda men kamhal himiya samaga wada karanna giye na.namuth aananda kedinakawath kamhalhimiyage kriyawa anumatha kale na.wahikalayata aanandalata wada nothibunu nisa ee dawaswala awashyatha sapura ganna wune bohoma amaruwen.me wage dawasaka aananda kamhalhimiya munagahune hadissiyata athamaruwak laba ganna.eeth kamhalhimikaru aanandage illima prathikshepa kala.ee witharak neweyi;aanandata nosahenna bana waduna.aananda wisin thamata wiruddhawa kumanthranayaka yedena bawatath chodana kala.me bahin bas wima randuwakata peralimata gathawune tika welawayi.awasanaye 'rabar roti'mashimak idiripita le wilak mada aanandage nisala sirura wati thibuna.paththakin hitiye 'roti thati'iwathata adina yakada kura atha daragath kamhal himikaru.thawath mada welawakin mashima langa wati thibunu sirura rabar waththe konaka madak gambaurata sarana lada walaka paswalata yatawuna.eyatath udin watune wiyali rabar kola.athurudahan wu aananda pilibanda kisima thorathurak katawathma danaganna bariwuna.eeth siddhiya arambaune aanandage maranayen thunmasayakata withara passe.mulinma amuthu amuthu dewal siduwenna wune rabar kamhala athule.rabar roti hadana mashima langa le wati thiyenawa mulinma dutuwe sewakayek.eda ee pallama pihadala damuwath hama rathriyakama le pallama aluth wuna.thada patin;ee hadetama.meka katath prehelikawak wuna.eeta passe mashimen hadunu hama rabar rotiyakama rathu patin le thawari thibuna.rabar gaswala wahi aawarana kawurun wisin ho galawa dama thibuna.rathriyata rabar kamhala thulin wilapa;bahin bas wim asennata wuna.ee hamatama wada asamanya de wune rabar kiri nokapana kalayata rabar gas atharin adiyana aanandage apahadili rupaya.ee ruwa rabar waththa kone di nopeni yannata wuna.welawanam dan hayayi kalayi.kochchiya na.sagaya thamath istesame.tiken tika kaluwarath watigena enawa.ehenam suba rathriyak wewa!

landan olimpik krida ulelata sudusukam labu shri lankawe badmintan supiri tharuwa niluka karunarathnata awashya siyalu pahasukam idiriyedith labadena bawa krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha pawasayi.me athara olimpik gamana sarthaka kara ganimata krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahatha laba dena mulya anugrahaya ha anekuth pahasukam pilibanda sthuthiya pala karana bawa badmintan shura niluka karunarathna prakasha kaleya.emenma wasara kihipayaka sita anugrahaya laba dena maklarans aayathanayatada pranamaya puda karana bawa hethema pawasiya.krida amathyanshaye ha maklarans aayathanaye anugrahaya gewi giya kalaye tharagawali rasaka daskam dakwimata shakthiyak wu bawa da ohu sadahan kaleya.olimpik parisadhana mattama pasu kirimen anathuruwa niluka karunarathnata suba pathime hamuwak pereda kolambaadi pawathi athara ema awasthawata krida amathi olimpik kamitu sabhapathi ha anugrahaka maklarans aayathanaye niyojithayan athulu wishala pirisak ekwa sitiyaha.mehidi adahas dakwu niluka karunarathna pawasuwe landan olimpik tharagawaliyata muhunadima udesa thama honda sudanamakin pasuwana bawayi.‘ma dan uparima thalayata piwisa sitinawa.
